00036 #ifndef MSQ_SPHERICAL_DOMAIN_HPP

00042 namespace MESQUITE_NS

00048   class MESQUITE_EXPORT SphericalDomain : public Mesquite::MeshDomain
00049   {
00050   public:
00051     SphericalDomain(const Vector3D& center, double radius )
00052         : mCenter(center), mRadius(radius)
00053       {}
00054       
00055     SphericalDomain()
00056       {}
00057 
00058     virtual ~SphericalDomain();
00059 
00060     void set_sphere(const Vector3D& center, double radius)
00061       {
00062         mCenter = center;
00063         mRadius = radius;
00064       }
00065       
00066     void fit_vertices( Mesh* mesh, 
00067                        MsqError& err,
00068                        double epsilon = 0.0 );
00069       
00070     void fit_vertices( Mesh* mesh, 
00071                        const Mesh::VertexHandle* vertex_array,
00072                        size_t vertex_array_length,
00073                        MsqError& err,
00074                        double epsilon = 0.0 );
00075     
00076     virtual void snap_to(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00077                          Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00078     
00079     virtual void vertex_normal_at(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00080                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00081      
00082     virtual void element_normal_at(Mesh::ElementHandle entity_handle,
00083                                    Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00084    
00085     virtual void vertex_normal_at(const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle,
00086                                   Vector3D coords[],
00087                                   unsigned count,
00088                                   MsqError& err) const;
00089 
00090     virtual void closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
00091                                 const Vector3D& position,
00092                                 Vector3D& closest,
00093                                 Vector3D& normal,
00094                                 MsqError& err ) const;
00095 
00096     virtual void domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle_array,
00097                              unsigned short* dof_array,
00098                              size_t num_vertices,
00099                              MsqError& err ) const;
00100                              
00101     Vector3D center() const { return mCenter; }
00102     double radius() const { return mRadius; }
00103   private:
